Module com.library
Package com.library.Services

Class BookService

java.lang.Object
com.library.Services.BookService
public class BookService extends Object
This class provides services for managing books in the library system. It includes methods for adding, removing, updating, searching, and rating books.

  • Constructor Details

    • BookService

      public BookService(BookManager bookmanager)
      Constructs a new instance of the BookService class.
      Parameters:
      bookmanager - The BookManager instance to be associated with this BookService. The Book Manager contrains the list of the books of the library.

  • Method Details

    • getBookManager

      public BookManager getBookManager()
      Returns the BookManager instance associated with this BookService.
      Returns:
      BookManager

    • addBook

      public void addBook(String title, String author, String pubHouse, String isbn, String pubDate, String category)
      Creates and adds a new book to the library system.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book.
      author - The author of the book.
      pubHouse - The publishing house of the book.
      isbn - The ISBN of the book.
      pubDate - The publication date of the book.
      category - The category of the book.

    • removeBook

      public void removeBook(Book book)
      Removes a book from the library system.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to be removed.

    • updateCopies

      public void updateCopies(Book book, int count)
      Updates the number of copies of a book in the library system.
      Parameters:
      book - The book whose copies are to be updated.
      count - The number of copies to be added or subtracted.

    • getBookByBookId

      public Book getBookByBookId(UUID bookId)
      Retrieves a book from the library system based on its unique identifier (UUID).
      Parameters:
      bookId - The unique identifier of the book to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The book with the matching UUID, or null if no book is found.

    • updateBook

      public void updateBook(Book book, String title, String author, String pubHouse, String isbn, String pubDate, String category)
      Updates the details of a book in the library system.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to be updated.
      title - The new title of the book.
      author - The new author of the book.
      pubHouse - The new publishing house of the book.
      isbn - The new ISBN of the book.
      pubDate - The new publication date of the book.
      category - The new category of the book.

    • addUserComment

      public void addUserComment(Book book, UUID uuid, String commentText)
      Adds a new user comment to a book in the library system.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to which the comment is to be added.
      uuid - The unique identifier of the user making the comment.
      commentText - The text of the user comment.

    • searchBook

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Book> searchBook(String title, String author, String date)
      Searches for books in the library system based on any combination of title, author, and publication date. If the field is empty it ignores it.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book to search for.
      author - The author of the book to search for.
      date - The publication date of the book to search for.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of books that match the search criteria.

    • getTopBooks

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Book> getTopBooks(Integer number)
      Retrieves the top-rated books from the library system.
      Parameters:
      number - The number of top-rated books to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of the top-rated books.

    • rate

      public void rate(Book book, double rating)
      Updates the average rating of a book in the library system after a user's rating. Updates the number of the users that have rated the book.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to be rated.
      rating - The rating to be assigned to the book.

    • searchBookByCategory

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Book> searchBookByCategory(String category)
      Searches for books in the library that belong to a category.
      Parameters:
      category - The category of the books to search for.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of books that match the search criteria.

    • updateCategories

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> updateCategories()
      Retrieves the list of unique categories of books in the library system.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of unique categories of books.

    • replaceCategory

      public void replaceCategory(String category, String newCategory)
      Replaces the category of books in the library system with a new category.
      Parameters:
      category - The category to be replaced.
      newCategory - The new category to replace the old category.
